body: Not Nami, just a continuation of Ochiru Tenshi. The third volume was never completed and Distance dropped the series sadly. Maybe he couldn’t figure out a way to end it happily or satisfyingly. I mean she sleeps with her best friend’s boyfriend in volume 2 and hurts her terribly. The guy is a dipshit though, but her actions were also a great betrayal. Or maybe he just got tired of the series, etc. Who knows if he’ll ever return to it but I don’t think he will. Too many years now.
Also would really like for this to continue
I was kinda expecting the guy to fuck her a little disappointed
There are so many variations of Nami(One Piece) that this can easily be one of them.
